title: REQUIREMENTS for Want to build a Game
content:
# Requirement Document for: Want to build a Game

## 1. Introduction
This document outlines the core requirements for the proposed solution.

## 2. Functional Requirements
- **User Authentication**: System must support secure login/signup.
- **core Feature**: The system shall implement the main logic for Want to build a Game.
- **Dashboard**: User dashboard to view metrics.

## 3. Non-Functional Requirements
- **Performance**: < 200ms response time.
- **Security**: Data encryption at rest and in transit.

title: PLANNING for Want to build a Game
content:
# Project Plan
    
## Phases
1. **MVP**: Core features of Want to build a Game.
2. **Phase 2**: Advanced Analytics.

title: ARCHITECTURE for Want to build a Game

# Technical Architecture

## Stack

- **Backend**: Node.js Express
- **Database**: PostgreSQL
